requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Processor: at least Dual Core
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Processor: Quad Core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Mac OSX 10.9+
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-6100 / AMD FX-8350
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 580 / AMD HD 7870
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 MB available space
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:

  • OS: Mac OSX 10.9+
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4670K / AMD Ryzen 5 1500X
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 680 / AMD HD 7970
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 MB available space

  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
